title: Christian Aid’s 70th Anniversary Carol Service 2015
desc: Join us for our 70 th  Anniversary Carol Service  in London.  It's a wonderful?service of Christmas music and?readings to celebrate our 70 th  anniversary.  Taking place in the holy and historic surrounds of St Luke?s, Chelsea. Hosted by journalist  Huw Edwards  the service  will include music?led by the  St Luke?s Church Choir,   and readings by amongst others?our Chief Executive  Loretta Minghella .  We're delighted that our preacher will be  Rt Rev Tim Stevens , former Bishop of Leicester. Tickets are free, and groups are welcome,?please come prepared to make a donation towards our?health work in Nigeria where the UK government will match every pound given at this service.
